page.title: 06THE NAKED MAN IN SETTLE
page.content: We went up into Settle to the{cafe, {Ye olde Naked Man cafe}where we did a survey on it. The cafe is quite big and has a big sign on the outside of it. Saturday is the most popular day for customers and some of them are quite famous television personalities. The cafe has been owned by the same people for fifty two years. It is open all the year round except for two weeks at Christmas time. In the summer {tourists}are attracted to the cafe (particularly because of the{naked man on the sign.) The cafe used to be an inn that was built in 1663. One of the stories about the name is that a man was buried naked underneath the building.
